Reviews.Title: just what i needed
Reviews.Author: greennleafy "thelionsgirl"
Reviews.Content: i got this to replace an identical phone that was disabled in an unfortunate accident.  i'd had that phone for more than two years and really like it.  my fear was that i wouldn't be able to find another one and would be stuck with one of those "smart" phones.  as luck would have it, the gu295 is fairly easy to find and the amazon price is pretty good.there was a problem with the first replacement and amazon quickly saw me through that, sending a, uh, replacement for the replacement immediately.i am very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: LG GU295
Reviews.Author: Ruby J. Morris
Reviews.Content: I am so pleased to have bought this new unlocked phone for my husband.  He had this phone previously but it was stolen and AT&T; no longer carried this phoine as a replacement.  My husband is blind and this is this best phone for him to use. No other carrier carries a phone that will meet the needs of the sight impaired.  Thank you for making his life just a little better.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be Happier!
Reviews.Author: G. Lewis
Reviews.Content: My brother had this phone for almost 2 years before it went for a swim in his coffee.  We dried it out (via the rice method) but some of the buttons just wouldn't work anymore.  I checked with AT&T; but they don't offer this model any longer so we took a chance and ordered this one from Amazon.  We stuck in the sim card and battery -- and voila!  Brand new working slider phone!!  I don't know why the other reviewer had a problem with the AT&T; sim card but ours fit perfectly and the phone works like a charm.  We're thrilled!!

Reviews.Title: Solid phone
Reviews.Author: Kathryn I Haslam
Reviews.Content: No complaints on this phone. Built solidly, great battery life, no problems at all. I use this as a person who is certainly comfortable with the operation of smart phone but chooses not to pay for one, so I don't know how this phone stacks up for someone who is not technicologically literate, but it's a very good quality phone for a basic plan.

Reviews.Title: exactly the same as my last one.
Reviews.Author: Stephen Lutz
Reviews.Content: Its a perfect replacement for the one I was wearing when I was riding my bike and the rain started pouring down.

Reviews.Title: Good replacement phone
Reviews.Author: John Saunders
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace the same model that got soaked when I was at the beach.  It is an exact replacement and works just fine.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Boris Kolontarov
Reviews.Content: Yas okey even the best i like it they sent me new one i'm satisfied it's good.So finale i have.

Reviews.Title: Not as Advertized
Reviews.Author: Rooster123
Reviews.Content: It says it is an Att phone but the sim card does not fit. This was very disappointing to me.
